languages.text: {n}Губернатор вновь оживляется.{/n} "И в этом самый смак! Горячо рекомедую вам попробовать, Звездное Сиятельство. Оч-чень разнообразит досуг. К тому же на этот раз привилегия клеймения, так сказать, принадлежит исключительно вам — как наше{mf|му|й} дорого{mf|му|й} звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор вновь оживляется.{/n} "И в этом самый смак! Горячо рекомедую вам попробовать, Звездное Сиятельство. Оч-чень разнообразит досуг. К тому же на этот раз привилегия клеймения, так сказать, принадлежит исключительно вам — как наше{mf|му|й} дорого{mf|му|й} звездно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье}".
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."

{n}The governor perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And the privilege of branding, if you will, this time belongs solely to you as our honoured celestial guest."

languages.text: {n}总督突然间打起了精神。{/n}“而这样的挑战才是最有趣的部分！我强烈建议您尝试一下，这会是非常有趣的消遣。如果您有兴趣参加的话，给冒牌货烙上烙印的特权完全在您手里，尊贵的大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督突然间打起了精神。{/n}“而这样的挑战才是最有趣的部分！我强烈建议您尝试一下，这会是非常有趣的消遣。如果您有兴趣参加的话，给冒牌货烙上烙印的特权完全在您手里，尊贵的大人。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador vuelve a animarse.{/n} «¡Esa es la mejor parte! Le recomiendo encarecidamente que lo pruebe, Excelencia Celestial. Es un cambio de ritmo muy interesante. Además, en esta ocasión, el privilegio de la marca, por así decirlo, será exclusivamente suyo por ser nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a} de honor».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador vuelve a animarse.{/n} «¡Esa es la mejor parte! Le recomiendo encarecidamente que lo pruebe, Excelencia Celestial. Es un cambio de ritmo muy interesante. Además, en esta ocasión, el privilegio de la marca, por así decirlo, será exclusivamente suyo por ser nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a} de honor».

languages.text: {n}Vali bir anda yeniden dile geliyor.{/n} "Ancak en iyi kısmı da bu! Denemenizi şiddetle tavsiye ederim Semavi Efendimiz. Çok ilginç bir tecrübe. Ayrıca damgalama ayrıcalığı tamamen size, yani saygın semavi konuğumuza ait."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali bir anda yeniden dile geliyor.{/n} "Ancak en iyi kısmı da bu! Denemenizi şiddetle tavsiye ederim Semavi Efendimiz. Çok ilginç bir tecrübe. Ayrıca damgalama ayrıcalığı tamamen size, yani saygın semavi konuğumuza ait."

languages.text: {n}総督が突然また元気を取り戻す。{/n}「それが一番の楽しみなんです！天の閣下、あなたも挑戦することをおすすめしますよ。非常に面白い気分転換になります。そして今回に限り、『刻印』の特権は、いわば、我らが尊き天のお客人であるあなたに完全に委ねられているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督が突然また元気を取り戻す。{/n}「それが一番の楽しみなんです！天の閣下、あなたも挑戦することをおすすめしますよ。非常に面白い気分転換になります。そして今回に限り、『刻印』の特権は、いわば、我らが尊き天のお客人であるあなたに完全に委ねられているのです」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur retrouve soudainement tout son entrain.{/n} « C'est la meilleure partie ! Je vous recommande vivement d'essayer, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Vous verrez, c'est vivifiant. De plus, en tant que céleste hôte, c'est à vous que revient le privilège de marquer l'imposteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur retrouve soudainement tout son entrain.{/n} « C'est la meilleure partie ! Je vous recommande vivement d'essayer, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Vous verrez, c'est vivifiant. De plus, en tant que céleste hôte, c'est à vous que revient le privilège de marquer l'imposteur. »

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur richtet sich mit einem Mal wieder auf.{/n} "Und das ist das Beste daran! Ich empfehle Euch dringend, es zu probieren, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Es ist wirklich eine höchst vergnügliche Abwechslung. Und natürlich gebührt das Privileg des Brandmarkens allein Euch, unserem geschätzten himmlischen Gast."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor suddenly perks up again.{/n} "And that is the best part! I highly recommend you try it, Your Celestial Highness. It makes for a very interesting change of pace. And, on this occasion, the privilege of branding, if you will, falls entirely to you, our honoured celestial guest."
